department.dept_long_name: Division of Engineering and Applied Sciences

course.title: Quantum Materials and Devices: From Research Lab to Classroom
course.faculty_text: Robert M. Westervelt and Kathryn Ann Hollar
course.description: The STC Center for Integrated Quantum Materials (Harvard University, Howard University, and MIT) builds electronics and photonics from Quantum Materials: Atomic Layers (graphene, boron nitride, transition-metal dichalcoginides) for atomic-scale devices, Topological Insulators for corruption-free data channels, and Nitrogen Vacancy Center Diamond for single-atom memory. Faculty from the Center will present tutorial lectures about their research.
course.prerequisites: Some experience and knowledge of electricity, magnetism, and quantum mechanics, either through research or courses.
